name: BeEF
description: Manipulate the browser exploiting any XSS vulns you find.

name: OWASP ZAP
description: This intercepting proxy allows you to see all HTTP traffic and manipulate it in real time. Easy to scan, catalog and exploit security issues.

name: Cookie Inspector
description: View and Edit Cookies easily using the developer tools pane.

name: BareTail
description: Brings the tail linux command to Windows, coloured lines and REGEX search and loads of other features.

name: ProxySwitcher
description: We all have to mess with proxies, this makes it a lot easier when using Test/Prod/localhost proxies.

name: Full Page Screenshot
description: For when PrintScreen isn't big enough.

name: Form Filler
description: Large forms can be really irritating to fill out each time, speed it up with dummy data.

name: Bug Magnet
description: Suggests values based on the field type.

name: Check All
description: "Select All" is often not available. Why not bring your own?

name: MyWords
description: Handy extension that can be used to save common snippets (Jira tables, test data etc.) you use often for easy typing.

name: Xmind
description: The best (free) Mindmapping tool for documenting your tests.

name: Colour Blindness Simulator
description: Simulate all types of Colour Blindness instantly!

name: Yslow
description: Analyse why web pages are slow based on Yahoo!'s rules for performance.

name: Agile Testing: A Practical Guide
description: A how to guide for those looking to transition to an Agile as a tester and also how the authors work on their Agile teams.

name: Explore It!: Reduce Risk and Increase Confidence with Exploratory Testing
description: A very good book on structuring Exploratory Testing and designing tests.

name: The Domain Testing Workbook
description: An in-depth look at the most common test technique, Domain Testing (also called Boundary Analysis and Equivalence Class partitioning) in use today with lots of examples to become better.

name: Don't Make Me Think: A Common Sense Approach to Web Usability
description: An incredibly useful book for usability testing.

name: Lessons Learn in Software Testing
description: One of the best books on Software Testing, broken into bite size lessons that are as applicable now as when it was published.

name: UI is Communication
description: How to make intuitive User Interfaces (UI and Usability Testing).

name: Thinking, Fast and Slow
description: About how we make decisions and how to run experiments (experiments == tests).

name: Learn to Code
description: Another awesome list for developer training

name: The Dojo
description: Courses and talks directly from the testing community.

name: Guru99
description: Learn by experience, a bit more fun than video training.

name: Coursera
description: Online courses from top universities.

name: Cybrary
description: Online free security training.

name: BBST Testing Courses
description: The famous Black Box Software Testing (BBST) courses are university level courses on Software Test Foundations, Bug Reporting and Test Design. These materials have been creative commons licensed for use by anyone. Includes articles, slides and video lectures.

name: Falsehoods
description: A funny and educational list of why nothing in Software Development is ever easy. Think you can store a marriage in a DB?

name: Naughty Strings
description: This is the famous list of Naughty Strings. If you're doing some field validation, look no further for inspiration.

name: Unicode
description: A great resource for learning how unicode works and the issues it can cause.

name: The Original
description: The awesome list of awesome lists.

name: Learn to Code
description: Learning to code, for those looking to make the move to automation

name: Application Security
description: Incredibly extensive, but you'll find something to fit the bill.

name: Selenium
description: Better than searching Google if you know what you want.

name: Security
description: This is mostly focused on Infrastructure, but if you're testing a series of systems, this is very useful.

name: Awesome Software Quality
description: A list of free software testing and verification resources.

name: Testers Rage Playlist
description: A collaborative playlist from testers for when the red mist descends.

name: Testers.io
description: Community Slack for testers to discuss everything and rant. Mostly rant.

name: Software Testing Conferences
description: A list of software testing conferences and workshops.
